flow.title: How It Spreads
content: COVID-19, also referred to as "Coronavirus" mainly spreads between people who are in close contact with one another (within about 6 feet or two meters) through respiratory droplets produced when an infected person coughs or sneezes.

flow.title: Avoid Close Contact
content: Avoid close contact with people who are sick.
Put distance between yourself and other people if COVID-19 is spreading in your community. This is especially important for people who are at higher risk of getting very sick, including the elderly.
